description_zh: 致⼒于汇聚少数⼈的⼒量，通过优质内容和产品，和大家一起用科学的方法和多维视角探索数字生活，提升⼤众⽤⼾的⼯作效率和⽣活品质。同时构建创作和创造的⾏业桥梁。
description_en: We are committed to pooling the strength of a small number of people. Through high-quality content and products, we will explore the digital life with everyone using scientific methods and multi-dimensional perspectives, and improve the work efficiency and life quality of the general users. At the same time, we will build an industry bridge for creation.
rating_zh: 建议分享自己的产品创作故事和经验，可以获得更多的讨论度和曝光。
rating_en: It is recommended to share your own product creation stories and experiences, which can generate more discussions and gain more exposure.
